title: risk
content: can i get cse or aiml in rr campus in second round of pessat counselling at 1718 rank? Right now i have blocked ece in rr campus.

comments.body: Did you not get the option of CS at EC campus? Or are you preferring RR campus over EC? If so, why?
Very high chance , cutoff was close to 1.7
And what about ai/ml in ec campus?
I heard it closed after rr ece , so around 3k mostly
Is there any chance i can get ai/ml in second round (5k rank)
tbh i didnt wanted the ec campus as the hostel is not in the campus which is a very big drawback. There would be bus facility for ec campus student which just seemed like living a school life again.
If you're in bangalore , attend 2nd round regardless. I'm guessing many people will leave the seat and most people won't opt for aiml in ec in 2nd round

Honestly, even day to day life will be like school. You'll have regular classes from 8:15-3:30 on most days. A bus journey isn't going to make a big difference IMO.

Also, campus isn't something you should compare on. It will be irrelevant in 3 years but your branch is forever.
Really doubt it, you can maybe get ece

Bro but the hostel is not in the campus, isnt that a very big disadvantage ? See i can obviously get cs in ec campus in next round of counseling but in future i want to take over my father's business which is producing lighting products which is purely electronics.

I don't see how hostel not being in campus is a *very* big disadvantage. An inconvenience yes, but shouldn't be a big issue. Secondly, if you're interested in electronics then stick to ECE. I was under the impression that you wanted CS because of the way you had phrased your question
